==1.1 For Windows==
Download the EXE installer from [http://babiloo.googlecode.com/files/babiloo-setup-0.7.exe here].

==1.2 For GNU/Linux ==

 # Install the JRE: 
{{{
sudo aptitude install sun-java6-jre
}}}

 # Download Babiloo 0.7 from [http://babiloo.googlecode.com/files/babiloo.jar here].
 # Run Babiloo 0.7
{{{
java -jar babiloo.jar
}}}
